sentences.en: A company director owes a fiduciary duty to the company.
sentences.cn: 公司董事应对公司负责受托人责任.

sentences.en: A company director owes fiduciary duty to the company.
sentences.cn: 公司董事对公司负有受托人责任.

sentences.en: A promoter has a fiduciary relationship with the company.
sentences.cn: 发起人与公司有信用上的关系.

sentences.en: Durability, and trustworthy, re - justice , Boli, a service is good for you forever fiduciary commitment!
sentences.cn: 保质 、 守信 、 重义 、 薄利 、 竭诚服务是福信人对您永远的承诺!

sentences.en: Federal and state politicians make efforts to impose a fiduciary duty on them.
sentences.cn: 政治家们努力把住手职责强加于他们.

sentences.en: Fiduciary Issue has been the highlight in the construction of securities market.
sentences.cn: 诚信问题已经成为证券市场建设中人们普遍关注的问题.

sentences.en: He was acting in a fiduciary capacity.
It is illegal for a fiduciary to misappropriate money for personal gain.
sentences.cn: 受托人为了个人利益挪用金钱是不合法的.

sentences.en: Managing somebody is an unbelievable fiduciary responsibility.
sentences.cn: 受托管理某人的责任令人难以置信.

sentences.en: Running currency and fiduciary loan is its main characteristic.
sentences.cn: 其行业特点是以货币为经营对象及以信用放款为主.

sentences.en: The law regards the relationship between a trustee and a beneficiary as a fiduciary relationship.
sentences.cn: 法律把受托人和受益人之间的关系看作是一种信用关系.

sentences.en: They have a case against their directors for breach of fiduciary duty.
sentences.cn: 他们掌握了足够的证据控告董事违犯信托责任。

sentences.en: This Act shall not apply to breaches of trust or of other fiduciary obligation.
sentences.cn: 本法不适用于违背信托或者其他信义义务的情形.

sentences.en: To the beneficiary the trustee a fiduciary duty.
sentences.cn: 受托人对受益人负有信托义务.

sentences.en: We are not acting and do any way as an advisor or in a fiduciary capacity.
sentences.cn: 我们不是也不作为您的财务顾问或是受托人.

words.tran_cn: [测] 基准的；信托的；根据信仰的

trans.tran_cn: 信托的；信用的；（尤指）受委托的，受信托的
trans.tran_en: Fiduciary is used to talk about things which relate to a trust, or to the people who are in charge of a trust
